description: Primes p such that x^5 = 17 has a solution mod p.
comments: Complement of A040979 relative to A000040. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 13 2012
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: ok[p_] := Reduce[Mod[x^5 - 17, p] == 0, x, Integers] =!= False; Select[Prime[Range[150]], ok] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 12 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(400) | exists(t){x : x in ResidueClassRing(p) | x^5 eq 17}]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 19 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
